purpose_text.para: Defines the upper limit for the profiling buffer, and enables the profiling buffer

field_description.para: Limit address. PMBLIMITR_EL1.LIMIT:Zeros(12) is the address of the first byte in memory after the last byte in the profiling buffer. If the smallest implemented translation granule is not 4KB, then bits[N-1:12] are RES0, where N is the IMPLEMENTATION DEFINED value, Log2(smallest implemented translation granule).

field_value_description.para: Stop collection and raise maintenance interrupt on buffer fill.

field_description.para: All other values are reserved. If this field is programmed with a reserved value, the PE behaves as if this field has a defined value, other than for a direct read of the register. Software must not rely on the behavior of reserved values, as they might change in a future version of the architecture.
